entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main protagonist of the story, a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

entities.name: madam pomfrey
entities.description: The matron of Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, who is strict but nice.

entities.name: professor dumbledore
entities.description: The Headmaster of Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, who is worried about Harry.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry's friend and a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

entities.description: Harry's friend and a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

entities.name: earwax
entities.description: An object that Harry mistakenly said he choked on.

relationships.description: Madam Pomfrey is interacting with Harry Potter, trying to get him to rest.
Professor Dumbledore is concerned about Harry Potter's well-being.
Ron and Harry are friends, as they are both students at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.
Hermione and Harry are friends, as they are both students at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.
